text: Ddan akked wayen xedmen ccwaien mgal tagelda n Sliman. Sliman ur ijhil. Maca ccwaien jehlen. Sseefaven i medden sseur, akked wayen id irsen, di Babil, ar lmalayek Harut akked Marut. Ur sselmaden yiwen, mebla ma nnan: "nekwni n$ewwu kan, ur jehhel"! EEEEefven, $uosen, amek ara ssemfaoaqen argaz akked tmeiiut is. Ur iiurun yiwen syis, siwa ma Ib$a Oebbi. EEEEefven ara ten ivuooen, ur ten ineffaa. Ni$ eoan ar win i p iu$en, ur as illi umur di laxeot. War ccekk, ard ucmit wayen is zzenzen leowae nnsen, lemmer eoin
